data.trans_hint: Họ bắt đầu cãi nhau, và tôi nghĩ đã đến lúc mình phải vào cuộc.
data.en_hint: They began to quarrel, and I thought it was time I stepped in.
data.content_game_1: They began to quarrel, and I thought it was time I stepped in.
data.answer_en_hint: They began to quarrel, and I thought it was time I stepped in.

data.trans: Tấn công (đột ngột, không chủ đích)
data.trans_hint: Con chó đột nhiên tấn công anh ấy.
data.content_game_1: The dog turned on him.
data.answer_en_hint: The dog turned on him.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta luôn rời đi khi gặp vấn đề thay vì đối mặt với nó.
data.en_hint: He always walks away from the problem instead of dealing with it.
data.content_game_1: He always walks away from the problem instead of dealing with it.
data.answer_en_hint: He always walks away from the problem instead of dealing with it.

data.trans: Nói dông dài về ai, cái gì
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy không ngừng dông dài kể về việc cô ấy giàu có như thế nào.
data.en_hint: She keeps going on and on about how rich she is.
data.content_game_1: She keeps going on and on about how rich she is.
data.answer_en_hint: She keeps going on and on about how rich she is.

data.trans: Tấn công ai đó (về mặt thể chất)
data.trans_hint: Tôi thấy họ đang đi bộ trên đường, rồi đột nhiên, một cô gái tấn công cô còn lại.
data.en_hint: I saw them walking on the street, then all of a sudden, one girl went for the other.
data.content_game_1: I saw them walking on the street, then all of a sudden, one girl went for the other.
data.answer_en_hint: I saw them walking on the street, then all of a sudden, one girl went for the other.

data.trans_hint: Khi tôi đến, tôi đã nghe thấy mẹ của cô ấy đang chỉ trích cô ấy vì không làm việc nhà.
data.en_hint: When I arrived, I heard her mother was having a go at her for not doing housework.
data.content_game_1: When I arrived, I heard her mother was having a go at her for not doing housework.
data.answer_en_hint: When I arrived, I heard her mother was having a go at her for not doing housework.

data.trans: Cười trừ để làm cái gì bớt nghiêm trọng
data.trans_hint: Bất kể khi nào mẹ của tôi đề cập về việc tôi không có bồ, tôi chỉ cười và không bận tâm lắm.
data.en_hint: Whenever my mother mentioned about my being single, I just laugh it off and take no notice.
data.content_game_1: Whenever my mother mentioned about my being single, I just laugh it off and take no notice.
data.answer_en_hint: Whenever my mother mentioned about my being single, I just laugh it off and take no notice.

data.trans: Đừng xía vào chuyện của người khác
data.trans_hint: Xen vào cuộc sống của người khác là điều không đúng đắn. Bạn không nên xía vào chuyện của người khác.
data.en_hint: It is not wise to meddle in other people's lives. You should mind your own business.
data.content_game_1: It is not wise to meddle in other people's lives. You should mind your own business.
data.answer_en_hint: It is not wise to meddle in other people's lives. You should mind your own business.

data.content: not lift a finger to do
data.trans: Không giúp đỡ, chẳng động một ngón tay để giúp
data.trans_hint: Chồng tôi không hề giúp đỡ tôi việc nhà.
data.en_hint: My husband doesn't lift a finger to help me with home.
data.content_game_1: My husband doesn't lift a finger to help me with home.
data.answer_en_hint: My husband doesn't lift a finger to help me with home.

data.trans_hint: Bạn nên coi trọng bố mẹ của mình. Họ không ở với bạn mãi đâu.
data.en_hint: You never should take your parents for granted. They will not be with you for forever.
data.content_game_1: You never should take your parents for granted. They will not be with you for forever.
data.answer_en_hint: You never should take your parents for granted. They will not be with you for forever.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi chẳng bao giờ nghe chuyện từ hai phía. Thay vì thế, bà ấy luôn luôn mắng tôi mỗi khi có vấn đề gì đó xảy ra giữa em tôi và tôi.
data.en_hint: My mother never hears two sides of the story. Instead, she always tells me off whenever there is a problem between my brother and me.
data.content_game_1: My mother never hears two sides of the story. Instead, she always tells me off whenever there is a problem between my brother and me.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother never hears two sides of the story. Instead, she always tells me off whenever there is a problem between my brother and me.
